item.title: CVE-2021-34664|2024-08-04T00:19:47.336Z -- moova%20for%20woocommerce -- moova%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Moova for WooCommerce WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the lat parameter in the ~/Checkout/Checkout.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 3.5.
